Highlighted Clause: You acknowledge that the applicable third party is solely responsible for its offerings and vendor makes no representations or warranties concerning those offerings and accepts no liability with respect to them
Plain Language Summary: You agree that if you use products or services from a third party, the vendor of the terms you are reading is not responsible for those third-party products or services and cannot be held liable for any issues that arise from using them.

Highlighted Clause: The terms of this agreement will be construed as having been drafted jointly by the parties, and no presumption or burden of proof will arise favoring or disfavoring any party by virtue of the authorship of any provisions of this agreement.
Plain Language Summary: If there's any uncertainty or disagreement about the meaning of the terms in the agreement, it will be interpreted as if both parties wrote it together. This means neither party will automatically be favored or blamed just because they wrote part of the agreement.

Highlighted Clause: You acknowledge that: (i) results you may obtain from family space, including data and messaging, may not be accurate, timely or reliable.
Plain Language Summary: You recognize that the information or results you get from using Family Space may not always be correct, up-to-date, or dependable.

Highlighted Clause: Vendor may at any time deliver any notice to you via electronic mail, pop-up window, dialog box or other means, even though in some cases you may not receive the notice unless and until you launch a solution.
Plain Language Summary: The vendor may send you notices through email, pop-up windows, dialog boxes, or other methods, and you may not see these notices until you open or use the service or product they provide.

Highlighted Clause: This agreement will immediately terminate upon your breach of any of your obligations in this agreement
Plain Language Summary: Your right to use the service will end immediately if you fail to follow any of the rules listed in this agreement.

Highlighted Clause: To the full extent permitted by law, in no event will vendor or any company that controls, is controlled by or is under common control with vendor be liable to you or any third party for any loss or damage
Plain Language Summary: If allowed by law, the vendor and any related companies won't be responsible for any harm or losses you or others might suffer related to the service they offer.

Highlighted Clause: vendor may amend this agreement at any time by notice provided to you in accordance with this agreement, and your continued use of any affected solution at any point at least 30 days after the notice date will constitute your acceptance of the amendment of this agreement.
Plain Language Summary: The vendor can change the terms of the agreement at any time, and if you keep using the service at least 30 days after they notify you, that means you agree to the new terms.

Highlighted Clause: The arbitration proceedings will be conducted by conference call.
Plain Language Summary: If there's a dispute, it will be handled over a conference call rather than in person.

Highlighted Clause: You must notify vendor promptly if the appliance is or becomes defective.
Plain Language Summary: If the product you got with the service stops working or is faulty, you must tell the vendor right away.

Highlighted Clause: This agreement constitutes the entire agreement between you and vendor relating to your use of the solutions and documentation.
Plain Language Summary: This document outlines your entire agreement with the vendor regarding your use of their services and any accompanying information.

Highlighted Clause: You must comply with all applicable u.s. and international laws governing export and re-export of the solutions, including the u.s. export administration regulations, as well as end-user, end-use and destination restrictions issued by u.s. and other governments.
Plain Language Summary: You need to follow all the laws that apply to shipping and sending the service or product out of the country, including the rules set by the United States and other countries.

Highlighted Clause: You agree to pay all royalties, fees, and any other monies owed to any person by reason of you uploading, publishing, displaying, distributing or making available your content on the mtip or members of the vendor group or vendor partners exercising any of the rights, licenses and permissions you have granted under this section 13.16.
Plain Language Summary: If you share content using the service, you are responsible for paying any money you owe to others for using that content.

Highlighted Clause: This agreement, the applicable conditions and the documentation, to the greatest extent reasonably practicable, will be construed to be consistent with each other, but in the event of a conflict they will govern in the following order of precedence: (i) the applicable conditions.
Plain Language Summary: If there's a conflict in the terms, priority will be given to the specific terms that apply to the service you're using.

Highlighted Clause: No arbitration or proceeding will be combined with another without the prior written consent of all parties to all affected arbitrations or proceedings.
Plain Language Summary: You can't combine your legal case with someone else's case unless everyone involved agrees to it in writing.
